title: Smart Inventory Management
subtitle: Transform Field Operations with Real-Time Inventory Intelligence locations.
teaser: Track every piece of equipment and material in real-time with RFID integration and predictive restocking.
body:
Revolutionizing Field Inventory Control

OverSiteAI’s Smart Inventory Management system delivers next-generation visibility and control for Oil & Gas field operations. Every asset—from critical equipment and fluid barrels to everyday consumables—is tracked automatically and in real time, empowering your team to operate with unmatched efficiency and confidence.

Key Features

  • RFID & Barcode Integration
    Instantly track all tagged equipment and materials as they move through your operations. 

  • Predictive Restocking
    AI-driven forecasting analyzes consumption trends and scheduled activity to proactively prevent stock-outs.

  • Multi-Site Visibility
    Monitor inventory levels across all sites and warehouses from a unified dashboard—no more silos.

  • Automated Reordering
    Set custom thresholds and let the system trigger procurement workflows automatically.

Real Results for Oil & Gas

  • Reduce carrying costs by up to 30%—without risking critical stock-outs

  • Eliminate last-minute emergency orders and costly expedited shipments

  • Gain actionable insights into field inventory usage, shrinkage, and replenishment cycles

Seamless Integration

  • Works with your existing ERP, procurement, and accounting systems

  • Fast onboarding and configuration—no disruption to current operations

  • Secure, scalable, and tailored for the complex needs of Oil & Gas field logistics

Experience total control, fewer supply chain headaches, and significant bottom-line savings with OverSiteAI Smart Inventory Management.
